Atlanta.Inman Park\u2013Moreland Historic Distri:
Inman Park–Moreland Historic District is a historic district in Inman Park, Atlanta, Georgia that was listed on the National Register of Historic Places (NRHP) in 1986. It includes the Kriegshaber House, now the Wrecking Ball Brewpub, which is separately NRHP-listed.
The district spans the Fulton County-DeKalb County border.
